on reading compounds: 場【ジョウ】place, spot, grounds, arena, stadium, range, course
場外【ジョウガイ】outside the hall (or stadium, market, etc.), off the grounds, off the premises, off-track
斎場【サイジョウ】funeral hall, ceremony site
開場【カイジョウ】opening (the doors to an event, etc.), inauguration
kun reading compounds: 場【ば】place, spot, space, field, discipline, sphere, realm, occasion, situation, scene (of a play, movie, etc.), session (of the stock market), area in which cards are laid out (in a card game), round (i.e. east, south, etc.), field, field (gestalt psychology)
漁場【ぎょじょう】fishing grounds, permitted fishing zone
